root.name: Unstoppable Gorg
root.description: OverviewUnstoppable Gorg is a tower defense game where the player can can move your towers around by rotating the orbits around planets, moons and space stations. The game is also an homage to vintage sci-fi films from the 1950s and features cutscenes in full-motion video.LinksOfficial WebsiteSystem RequirementsPCOS: Windows® XP SP3 / Windows® Vista / Windows® 7.Processor: Intel® Pentium® 4 (2Ghz) or AMD® Athlon 64 (1.6GHz) processor or better.Memory: 1GB RAM.Hard Disk Space: 2GB free.Video Card: NVIDIA 6600 or ATI X700, 256MB GPU memory or better.DirectX®: DirectX® 9 or later.Sound: DirectX compatible sound card.MacOS: OS X version Leopard 10.5.8, Snow Leopard 10.6.3, or later.Processor: 2.0 GHz Intel Core 2 Duo.Memory: 1GB RAM.Hard Disk Space: 2GB free.Video Card: NVIDIA Geforce 9400M.
